info.report-description: LTE UE and Service Differentiation (M8023) measures Operator specific UE and Service Differentiation items.

kpi_info.title: period_duration (period_duration)
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes.

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_DATA_VOL_UL_QCI_1 (M8023C0)
kpi_info.use: The measurement gives an indication of the eUu interface traffic load by reporting the total received PDCP SDU-related traffic volume for all UEs assigned to QCI Counter Group 1. Note: QCI Counter Group as such is applicable for Operator Specific QCIs introduced in RL30/RL25TD by LTE518: Operator-specific QCI and later on, in RL60/RL45TD, extended by LTE1231: Operator-specific GBR QCIs. These counters are not related to generic QCI1-QCI9. UPDATED: This counter is updated when a PDCP SDU is received from a UE assigned to QCI Counter Group 1.

kpi_info.title: PDCP_SDU_DATA_VOL_UL_QCI_2 (M8023C1)
kpi_info.use: The measurement gives an indication of the eUu interface traffic load by reporting the total received PDCP SDU-related traffic volume for all UEs assigned to QCI Counter Group 2. Note: QCI Counter Group as such is applicable for Operator Specific QCIs introduced in RL30/RL25TD by LTE518: Operator-specific QCI and later on, in RL60/RL45TD, extended by LTE1231: Operator-specific GBR QCIs. These counters are not related to generic QCI1-QCI9. UPDATED: This counter is updated when a PDCP SDU is received from a UE assigned to QCI Counter Group 2.

Note: QCI Counter Group as such is applicable for Operator Specific QCIs introduced in RL30/RL25TD by LTE518: Operator-specific QCI and later on, in RL60/RL45TD, extended by LTE1231: Operator-specific GBR QCIs. kpi_info.title: AVG_ACT_UE_PROFILE_1 (M8023C12)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the average number of active UEs per cell assigned to Mobility Profile 1. A UE is defined as "active" if SRB and at least one DRB have been established. An ongoing data transfer is not mandatory to belong to this group of UEs. UPDATED: The average of samples taken from the number of active UEs, having one SRB and at least one DRB established. The SPID assigned to the UE has to be mapped to Mobility Profile 1 according to the SPID Mapping Table.

kpi_info.title: AVG_ACT_UE_PROFILE_2 (M8023C13)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the average number of active UEs per cell assigned to Mobility Profile 2. A UE is defined as "active" if SRB and at least one DRB have been established. An ongoing data transfer is not mandatory to belong to this group of UEs. UPDATED: The average of samples taken from the number of active UEs, having one SRB and at least one DRB established. The SPID assigned to the UE has to be mapped to Mobility Profile 2 according to the SPID Mapping Table.

kpi_info.title: AVG_ACT_UE_PROFILE_3 (M8023C14)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the average number of active UEs per cell assigned to Mobility Profile 3. A UE is defined as "active" if SRB and at least one DRB have been established. An ongoing data transfer is not mandatory to belong to this group of UEs. UPDATED: The average of samples taken from the number of active UEs, having one SRB and at least one DRB established. The SPID assigned to the UE has to be mapped to Mobility Profile 3 according to the SPID Mapping Table.

kpi_info.title: AVG_ACT_UE_PROFILE_4 (M8023C15)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the average number of active UEs per cell assigned to Mobility Profile 4. A UE is defined as "active" if SRB and at least one DRB have been established. An ongoing data transfer is not mandatory to belong to this group of UEs. UPDATED: The average of samples taken from the number of active UEs, having one SRB and at least one DRB established. The SPID assigned to the UE has to be mapped to Mobility Profile 4 according to the SPID Mapping Table.

kpi_info.title: AVG_ACT_UE_PROFILE_5 (M8023C16)

An ongoing data transfer is not mandatory to belong to this group of UEs. UPDATED: The average of samples taken from the number of active UEs, having one SRB and at least one DRB established. The SPID assigned to the UE has to be mapped to Mobility Profile 5 according to the SPID Mapping Table.

kpi_info.title: AVG_ACT_UE_PROFILE_6 (M8023C17)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the average number of active UEs per cell assigned to Mobility Profile 6. A UE is defined as "active" if SRB and at least one DRB have been established. An ongoing data transfer is not mandatory to belong to this group of UEs. UPDATED: The average of samples taken from the number of active UEs, having one SRB and at least one DRB established. The SPID assigned to the UE has to be mapped to Mobility Profile 6 according to the SPID Mapping Table.

kpi_info.title: AVG_ACT_UE_PROFILE_7 (M8023C18)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the average number of active UEs per cell assigned to Mobility Profile 7. A UE is defined as "active" if SRB and at least one DRB have been established. An ongoing data transfer is not mandatory to belong to this group of UEs. UPDATED: The average of samples taken from the number of active UEs, having one SRB and at least one DRB established. The SPID assigned to the UE has to be mapped to Mobility Profile 7 according to the SPID Mapping Table.

kpi_info.title: AVG_ACT_UE_PROFILE_8 (M8023C19)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the average number of active UEs per cell assigned to Mobility Profile 8. A UE is defined as "active" if SRB and at least one DRB have been established. An ongoing data transfer is not mandatory to belong to this group of UEs. UPDATED: The average of samples taken from the number of active UEs, having one SRB and at least one DRB established. The SPID assigned to the UE has to be mapped to Mobility Profile 8 according to the SPID Mapping Table.

kpi_info.title: AVG_ACT_UE_PROFILE_DEFAULT (M8023C20)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the average number of active UEs per cell assigned to the Default Mobility Profile. A UE is defined as "active" if SRB and at least one DRB have been established. An ongoing data transfer is not mandatory to belong to this group of UEs. UPDATED: The average of samples taken from the number of active UEs, having one SRB and at least one DRB established. The Default Mobility Profile is assigned to the UE when either an SPID value is not assigned to the UE or when the SPID cannot be mapped to any of the 16 dedicated Mobility profiles.

kpi_info.title: AVG_NUM_ACT_UE_QCI_GRP1 (M8023C21)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the average number of active UEs per cell for operator-specific QCIs assigned to Counter Group 1. A UE is defined as "active" if SRB and at least one DRB have been established. An ongoing data transfer is not mandatory to belong to this group of UEs. UPDATED: The arithmetical average of samples taken from the number of active UEs, having one SRB and at least one DRB established. At least the operator-specific QCI of one DRB has to be assigned to the Counter Group 1 according to the QCI Translation Table.

kpi_info.title: AVG_NUM_ACT_UE_QCI_GRP2 (M8023C22)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the average number of active UEs per cell for operator-specific QCIs assigned to Counter Group 2. A UE is defined as "active" if SRB and at least one DRB have been established. An ongoing data transfer is not mandatory to belong to this group of UEs. UPDATED: The arithmetical average of samples taken from the number of active UEs, having one SRB and at least one DRB established. At least the operator-specific QCI of one DRB has to be assigned to the Counter Group 2 according to the QCI Translation Table.

kpi_info.title: AVG_NUM_ACT_UE_QCI_GRP3 (M8023C23)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the average number of active UEs per cell for operator-specific QCIs assigned to Counter Group 3. A UE is defined as "active" if SRB and at least one DRB have been established. An ongoing data transfer is not mandatory to belong to this group of UEs. UPDATED: The arithmetical average of samples taken from the number of active UEs, having one SRB and at least one DRB established. At least the operator-specific QCI of one DRB has to be assigned to the Counter Group 3 according to the QCI Translation Table.

kpi_info.title: AVG_NUM_ACT_UE_QCI_GRP4 (M8023C24)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the average number of active UEs per cell for operator-specific QCIs assigned to Counter Group 4. A UE is defined as "active" if SRB and at least one DRB have been established. An ongoing data transfer is not mandatory to belong to this group of UEs. UPDATED: The arithmetical average of samples taken from the number of active UEs, having one SRB and at least one DRB established. At least the operator-specific QCI of one DRB has to be assigned to the Counter Group 4 according to the QCI Translation Table.

kpi_info.title: AVG_NUM_ACT_UE_QCI_GRP5 (M8023C25)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the average number of active UEs per cell for operator-specific QCIs assigned to Counter Group 5. A UE is defined as "active" if SRB and at least one DRB have been established. An ongoing data transfer is not mandatory to belong to this group of UEs. kpi_info.title: AVG_NUM_ACT_UE_QCI_GRP6 (M8023C26)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the average number of active UEs per cell for operator-specific QCIs assigned to Counter Group 6. A UE is defined as "active" if SRB and at least one DRB have been established. An ongoing data transfer is not mandatory to belong to this group of UEs. UPDATED: The arithmetical average of samples taken from the number of active UEs, having one SRB and at least one DRB established. At least the operator-specific QCI of one DRB has to be assigned to the Counter Group 6 according to the QCI Translation Table.

kpi_info.title: NUM_QCI_GRP_MISMATCH (M8023C27)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the number of inconsistent QCI Counter Group assignments. UPDATED: This counter is incremented if the operator-specific QCIs of the DRBs for a UE do not share the same QCI Counter Group that is when a unique assignment of a UE context to a QCI Counter Group is not possible.

kpi_info.title: AVG_ACT_UE_PROFILE_9 (M8023C28)
kpi_info.use: This counter provides the average number of active UEs per cell assigned to Mobility Profile 9. A UE is defined "active" if SRB and at least one DRB have been established. UPDATED: The arithmetical average of samples taken from the number of active UEs, having one SRB and at least one DRB established. The SPID assigned to the UE has to be mapped to Mobility Profile 9 according to the SPID Mapping Table.

kpi_info.title: period_duration_sum (period_duration_sum)
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes. Values summed up also in object dimension.
